title: Newton's Method With $$n=5$$
text: To find $$x_5$$, use the equation $$x_n=\frac{1}{2} \left(x_n-1+\frac{2}{x_n}-1\right)$$ with $$n=5$$ and the value of $$x_4$$ stored on the calculator.

title: Subsequent Application of Newton's Method
text: Since we obtained the same value for $$x_4$$ and $$x_5$$, it is unlikely that the value $$x_n$$ will change on any subsequent application of Newton’s method.
